NYU Abu Dhabi Publications and Ephemera
NYU Abu Dhabi Publications and Ephemera

The NYU Abu Dhabi Publications and Ephemera collection consists of published bulletins, curricula guides, brochures, research reports, commemencement programs, class yearbooks, events catalogs and calendars, faculty and student journals, and a few commemorative artifacts, which document academic and community life across the NYU Abu Dhabi campus, including research achievements, from 2010 - present.

The NYU Abu Dhabi Publications and Ephemera collection consists of published bulletins, curricula guides, brochures, research reports, commemencement programs, class yearbooks, events catalogs and calendars, faculty and student journals, and a few commemorative artifacts, which document academic and community life across the NYU Abu Dhabi campus, including research achievements, from 2010 - present.

The NYU Abu Dhabi Publications and Ephemera collection is the primary collection of NYUAD publications in the University Archives. An accumulating, "living collection," this RG consists of published bulletins, curricula guides, brochures, research reports, commemencement programs, class yearbooks, events catalogs and calendars, faculty and student journals, and other commemorative artifacts and publications that document academic and community life across the NYU Abu Dhabi campus, including research achievements. When available, two copies of each publication have been retained and are preserved as part of this collection. A separate publication duplicates collection is also maintained.
Each series may include more specific information about certain titles, their history and how they were used.

Materials in this Record Group have been acquired over time from a variety of sources, donated to the library, picked up by Library staff at events, donated or transferred from outgoing staff upon their exiting employment, and transferred as part of an annual routine transfer (such as Bulletins transferred by the Registrar's Office). The original accession number was 2014.003.

Publications from the following accessions have been integrated as accretions to this collection: Acc2019.014 (Dustin Harris), Acc2019.028 (Paul Revere), Acc2020.008 (Dustin Harris), Acc2021.028 (Kate Chandler), Acc2022.040 (Paul Revere), Acc2022.041 (Pauline Conaghan), Acc2023.007 (Chuck Grim), Acc2023.012 (Jacqueline Jacbos),
